content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-6.0, 26.0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (not placed due to inventory issue)
- Boiler (not placed due to inventory issue)
- Offshore pump (not placed due to inventory issue)

### Copper plate factory at position(4.0, -63.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -63.0) with coal as fuel, currently has no ingredients to smelt and is producing copper plates.
- Lab (position not specified) with 10 automation science packs, currently has no power and is researching automation.
- Small electric poles at positions (2.5, 1.5), (2.5, 2.5), and (2.5, 0.5) forming an electricity group with id 103, currently providing no voltage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough iron plates, iron gear wheels, and pipes in your inventory before attempting to craft a steam engine. Check your inventory and gather the necessary resources first.

### Errors when placing steam engine next to water
- Make sure to have the steam engine in your inventory before attempting to place it next to a water source. Verify your inventory before executing placement commands.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
